1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.1: Moreover David and the chief. officers of the army separated for the ministry the sons of Asaph, and of Heman, and of Idithun: to prophesy with harps, and with psalteries, and with cymbals according to their number serving in their appointed office.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.2: Of the sons of Asaph: Zacchur, and Joseph, and Nathania, and Asarela, sons of Asaph: under the hand of Asaph prophesying near the king.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.3: And of Idithun: the sons of Idithun, Godolias, Serf, Jeseias, and Hasabias, and Mathathias, six, under the hand of their father Idithun, who prophesied with a harp to give thanks and to praise the Lord.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.4: Of Heman also: the sons of Heman, Bocciau, Mathaniau, Oziel, Subuel, and Jerimoth, Hananias, Hanani, Eliatha, Geddelthi, and Romemthiezer, and Jesbacassa, Mellothi, Othir, Mahazioth:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.5: All these were the sons of Heman the seer of the king in the words of God, to lift up the horn: and God gave to Heman fourteen sons and three daughters.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.6: All these under their father's hand were distributed to sing in the temple of the Lord, with cymbals, and psalteries and harps, for the service of the house of the Lord near the king: to wit, Asaph, and Idithun, and Heman.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.7: And the number of them with their brethren, that taught the song of the Lord, all the teachers, were two hundred and eighty-eight,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.8: And they cast lots by their courses, the elder equally with the younger, the learned and the unlearned together.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.9: And the first lot came forth to Joseph, who was of Asaph. The second to Godolias, to him and his sons, and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.10: The third to Zachur, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.11: The fourth to Isari, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.12: The fifth to Nathania, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.13: The sixth to Bocciau, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.14: The seventh to Isreela, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.15: The eighth to Jesaia, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.16: The ninth to Mathanaias, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.17: The tenth to Semeias, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.18: The eleventh to Azareel, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.19: The twelfth to Hasabia, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.20: The thirteenth to Subael, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.21: The fourteenth to Mathathias, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.22: The fifteenth to Jerimoth, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.23: The sixteenth to Hananias, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.24: The seventeenth to Jesbacassa, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.25: The eighteenth to Hanani, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.26: The nineteenth to Mellothi, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.27: The twentieth to Eliatha, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.28: The one and twentieth to Othir, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.29: The two and twentieth to Geddelthi, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.30: The three and twentieth to Mahazioth, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__25.31: The four and twentieth to Romemthiezer, to his sons and his brethren twelve.
